climbs.name: Little Toe
climbs.fa: Reed Ames, Pete Scollan, Kyle Campbell

content.description:
Top rope to the right of

Big Toe

. Starts down low on a crack and climbs up to the arete.
content.protection: 2 bolt anchor top rope. Walk off the back on 4th class.
content.location: Start down low and 15 feet to the right of big toe.

climbs.name: Big Toe
climbs.fa: Reed Ames, Pete Scollan, Kyle Campbell - September 2015

content.description:
Climb up the arete past 4 bolts, then turn the corner of the arete and climb up easy ground to a 2 bolt anchor on the "big toe". Walk off the back on 4th class terrian. Nice steep line, with good rock.

Did this climb on my 34th birthday.  It was an awesome day with great friends. I hope you enjoy it also.
content.protection: 4 bolts and 2 bolt anchor. Optional 1-2 inch cam near the top, or small runout on easy ground to the anchor. 4th class walk off the back.
content.location:
Located on the north west arete of the bear paw.

4th class walk off the back.
